## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for applied optimization remarks.

Definition at line 762 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### OptimizationRemark() {#a940829469e382e9dea15a5c8645a8387}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>OptimizationRemark::OptimizationRemark (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CodeRegion)</>}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark (single- word, camel-case). <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the debug location and <code>CodeRegion</code> is the region that the optimization operates on (currently only block is supported).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00770">770</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00284">284</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Same as above, but the debug location and code region are derived from <code>Instr</code>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Constructors

### OptimizationRemark() {#ae6c1c09c1c4dfa117974513c11e40383}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::OptimizationRemark::OptimizationRemark (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Msg)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is deprecated now and only used by the function API below.

<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic. If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location. <code>Msg</code> is the message to show. Note that this class does not copy this message, so this reference must be valid for the whole life time of the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00800">800</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
